mapper.select:
select d176.id$ as idq, '病案首页' as name, d176.mpiid$ as mpiidq, d176.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumq, d176.ORG_CODE as orgCodeq, to_char(d176.ADMISSION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordTimeq, to_char(d176.ADMISSION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as serviceTimeq, to_char(d176.ADMISSION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as hospitalizedTimeq, d176.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIdq, d176.MARITAL_STATUS_NAME as marriageFlagq, d176.AGE_MONTHS as patientMonthAgeq, d176.CURRENT_ADDRESS_CITY as nowAddressCityq, d176.CURRENT_ADDRESS_TEL as patientPhoneNumberq, d176.CASE_NUM as healthNumberq, d176.INSURANCE_NUM as medicalCardq, d176.PNAME as patientNameq, to_char(d176.BORN_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as patientBirthq, d176.IDCARD_NUM as patientIdCardq, d176.AGE_YEARS as patientAgeq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_PROVINCE as contactProvinceq, d176.RBT_CONTACT_CODE as contactPatientq, d176.HRA_ADDRESS_ZP as registeredNumberq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_CITY as contactCityq, d176.NATIVE_PLACE_CITY as hailCityq, d176.NATIVE_PLACE_PROVINCE as hailProvinceq, d176.BORN_ADDRESS_COUNTY as birthCountyq, d176.CURRENT_ADDRESS_ZP as nowPostalNumberq, d176.HRA_ADDRESS_CITY as registeredCityq, d176.ORG_NAME as orgNameq, d176.INPATIENT_DAY_NUM as hospitalizationDayq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_HN as contactDoorplateq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_TOWN as contactTownsq, d176.SEX_CODE as patientSexq, d176.HEALTH_CARD_NUM as residentIdCardq, d176.BORN_ADDRESS_PROVINCE as birthProvinceq, d176.NATION_NAME as nationq, d176.COUNTRY_NAME as nationalityq, d176.CURRENT_ADDRESS_PROVINCE as nowProvinceq, d176.CURRENT_ADDRESS_COUNTY as nowCountyq, d176.IDCARD_NUM as idCardNumberq, d176.LINKMAN_NAME as contactNameq, d176.HRA_ADDRESS_COUNTY as registeredCountyq, d176.HRA_ADDRESS_PROVINCE as registeredProvinceq, d176.BORN_ADDRESS_CITY as birthCityq, d176.LINKMAN_TEL as contactPhoneq, to_char(d176.DISCHARGE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as outHospitalTimeq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_VILLAGE as contactVillageq, d176.LINKMAN_ADDRESS_COUNTY as contactCountyq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_VILLAGE as workVillageq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_COUNTY as workCountyq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_PROVINCE as workProvinceq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_ZP as workAddressNumberq, d176.OCCUPATION_NAME as jobTypeCodeq, d176.WORKING_ORG as workNameq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_CITY as workCityq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_TOWN as workTownsq, d176.WORKING_ADDR_HN as workDoorplateq, d176.WORKING_TEL as workPhoneNumberq, d176.IN_WORD as inpatientWardsq, d176.BIRTH_BODY_WEIGHT as birthWeightq, d176.TDEP_NAME as turnDeptNameq, d176.IN_CONDITION_NAME as enterSituationq, d176.OUT_WORD as outWardq, d176.INPATIENT_TIMES as hospitalFrequencyq, d176.ADMISSION_BODY_WEIGHT as enterWeightq, d176.OUT_DEPT_NAME as outHospitalDeptNameq, d176.total_amount as hospitalizedFeeq, d176.CHARGE_MODE_CODE as paymentCodeq, d176.ADMISSION_TYPE_CODE as enterPathwayq, d176.TDEP_CODE as deptCodeq, d176.IN_DEP_NAME as deptNameq, d176.org_code AS "orgCodeTemp", d176.inpatient_num AS "zyIdTemp", d177.ID$ as idw, d177.ORG_CODE as orgCodew, d177.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumw, d177.PATHOLOGY_DISE_CODE as pathologyDiagnosisCodew, d177.PATHOLOGY_DIAG_CODE as pathologyDiagnosisNamew, d177.IS_AUTOPSY as autopsyFlagw, d177.IS_READMISSION as backHospitalFlagw, d177.RECEIVE_ORG_NAME as acceptOrgNamew, d177.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIdw, to_char(d177.QC_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as chargeDatew, d177.CASE_QUALITY_CODE as recordQualityw, d177.READMISSION_PURPOSE as backHospitalw, d177.AFTER_COMA_HOURS as comaTimew, d177.BLOOD_RH_CODE as rhaboCodew, d177.PRIOR_COMA_HOURS as comaAfterTimew, d177.ALLERG_DRUG as allergyDrugw, d177.PATHOLOGY_NUM as pathologyNumberw, d177.INJURY_CAUSE_CODE as poisoningDiagnosisCodew, d177.INJURY_CAUSE as poisoningCausew, d177.DISCHARGE_TYPE_CODE as hospitalModew, d177.RECEIVE_ORG_NAME as receiveOrgNamew, d177.INTERN_NAME as internshipSignaturew, d177.NURSE_NAME as nurseSignaturew, d177.RESIDENT_NAME as hospitalSignaturew, d177.CHIEF_PHYSICIAN_NAME as doctorSignaturew, d177.CODER_NAME as healthNameSignaturew, d177.QCN_NAME as chargeNurseSignaturew, d177.DIRECTOR_NAME as deptDoctorSignaturew, d177.ATTENDING_PHYSICIAN_NAME as indicationsSignaturew, d177.REFRESHER_DOCTORS_NAME as studiesSignaturew, d177.QCD_NAME as chargeSignaturew, d177.IS_ALLERGY as allergyFlagw, d177.BLOOD_ABO_CODE as aboCodew, d180.ID$ as ide, d180.ORG_CODE as orgCodee, d180.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNume, d180.OUT_DIAG_OTHER_IN as outOtherDiagnosisCodee, d180.OUT_DIAG_OTHER_CODE as outOthersDiagnosisCodee, d180.OUT_DIAG_MDISEASE_NAME as outDiagnosisNamee, d180.OUT_DIAG_MDISEASE_CODE as outDiagnosisCodee, d180.DISEASE_CODE as outpatientDiagnosisCodee, d180.OUT_DIAG_OTHER_NAME as outOthersDiagnosisNamee, d180.OUT_DIAG_IN_DISEASE as outCodee, d180.CH_DIAG_NAME as outPatientDiagnosis4TCSe, d180.CH_DIAG_CODE as outpatientDiagnosisCode4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DISEASE_NAME as outDiagnosisName4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DISEASE_CODE as outDiagnosisCode4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DIAG_IN_DISEASE as outCode4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DIAG_MDISEASE_NAME as outOthersDiagnosisName4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DIAG_MDISEASE_CODE as outOthersDiagnosisCode4TCSe, d180.OUT_CH_DIAG_MDISEASE as outOtherDiagnosisCode4TCSe, d180.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIde, d180.DISEASE_NAME as outPatientDiagnosise, d183.ID$ as idr, d183.ORG_CODE as orgCoder, d183.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumr, d183.COST_DRUG as westernFeer, d183.COST_TREAT_HOCUS as anesthesiaFeer, d183.COST_GENERAL_TREAT as operatingFeer, d183.COST_TREAT_OPTREAT as surgeryFeer, d183.COST_BLOOD as bloodFeer, d183.COST_DIAG_PATHOLOGY as diagnosisFeer, d183.COST_GENERAL_MEDI_SERVICE as generalFeer, d183.COST_DIAG_CLINIC as diagnosisItemFeer, d183.COST_DIAG_IMAGE as portraitDiagnosisFeer, d183.COST_OTHER as oterFeer, d183.COST_BLOOD_CELL as productsFeer, d183.COST_ANTIBAC as antibacterialsFeer, d183.COST_CH_HERBAL as herbsFeer, d183.COST_SELF_PAY as hospitalPaysMoneyr, d183.COST_GENERAL_OTHER as compositeOterFeer, d183.COST_DIAG_LAB as testdiagnosisFeer, d183.COST_TREAT_UNOPERATION as cureItemFeer, d183.COST_TREAT_OPERATION as cureSurgeryFeer, d183.COST_CH_TREAT as centerSurgeryFeer, d183.COST_CONSUMABLE_TREAT as materialFeer, d183.COST_BLOOD_GLOBIN as globulinFeer, d183.COST_CH_PATENT as medicineFeer, d183.COST_BLOOD_HERM as albuminFeer, d183.COST_RECOVERY as rehabilitationFeer, d183.COST_TREAT_PHYSIC as physicsFeer, d183.COST_NURSE as compositeNurseFeer, d183.COST_BLOOD_CRUOR as cruorFeer, d183.COST_CONSUMABLE_EXAM as censorMaterialFeer, d183.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIdr, d183.COST_CONSUMABLE_OP as operationMaterialFeer, d184.id$ as idt, ${param}, (select w.ITEM_NAME from GWC_BASEDATA_DETAIL w where w.BASEDATACLASS_CODE = 'CV05.10.022' and w.ITEM_CODE = d184.INCISION_CATEGORY_CODE) as operateCureLevelt, d184.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumt, d184.OPERATION_GRADE as surgeryLevelt, (select g.ITEM_NAME from GWC_BASEDATA_DETAIL g where g.BASEDATACLASS_CODE = 'CV05.10.023' and g.ITEM_CODE = d184.HEALING_GRADE_CODE) as surgeryTypet, d184.OPERATION_CODE as operateCodet, d184.SURGEON_NAME as operateDoctort, d184.ASSISTANT_FIR_NAME as assistantName1t, d184.ASSISTANT_SED_NAME as assistantName2t, d184.ORG_CODE as orgCodet, d184.OPERATION_NAME as operateNamet, d184.ANESTHESIA_DOC_NAME as anesthesiaDoctort, d184.HEALING_GRADE_NAME as assistantNamet, d184.ANAESTHESIA_CODE as anesthesiaTypet, d184.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIdt, to_char(d184.OPERATION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as operateDatet FROM PT_EMRI_ICH d176 left join PT_EMRI_ICH_ASSIST d177 on d177.INPATIENT_NUM = d176.INPATIENT_NUM and d177.ORG_CODE = d176.ORG_CODE and d177.CASE_HISTORY_ID = d176.CASE_HISTORY_ID left join PT_EMRI_ICH_DIAGNOSIS d180 on d180.INPATIENT_NUM = d176.INPATIENT_NUM and d180.ORG_CODE = d176.ORG_CODE and d180.CASE_HISTORY_ID = d176.CASE_HISTORY_ID left join PT_EMRI_ICH_CHARGE d183 on d183.INPATIENT_NUM = d176.INPATIENT_NUM and d183.ORG_CODE = d176.ORG_CODE and d183.CASE_HISTORY_ID = d176.CASE_HISTORY_ID left join PT_EMRI_ICH_OPERATION d184 on d184.INPATIENT_NUM = d176.INPATIENT_NUM and d184.ORG_CODE = d176.ORG_CODE and d184.CASE_HISTORY_ID = d176.CASE_HISTORY_ID where
( d176.INPATIENT_NUM=#{item.zyId} and d176.ORG_CODE=#{item.orgCode} )

select t12.ID$ as idq, '入院记录' as "name", t12.ORG_CODE as orgCode, t12.MPIID$ as mpiId, t12.ORG_NAME as orgName, to_char(t12.CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createdAt, t12.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNum, t12.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryId, t12.AREA_NAME as areaName, t12.DEP_CODE as depCode, t12.DEP_NAME as depName, t12.WARD_NUM as wardNum, t12.SICKBED_NUM as sickbedNum, t12.PNAME as pname, t12.SEX_CODE as sexCode, t12.IDCARD_TYPE as idcardType, t12.OTHER_ID_NUM as otherIdNum, t12.IDCARD_NUM as idcardNum, t12.AGE_YEARS as ageYears, t12.AGE_MONTHS as ageMonths, t12.AGE_DAYS as ageDays, t12.AGE_HOURS as ageHours, t12.NATION_CODE as nationCode, t12.NATION_NAME as nationName, t12.MARITAL_STATUS_CODE as maritalStatusCode, t12.MARITAL_STATUS_NAME as maritalStatusName, t12.OCCUPATION_CODE as occupationCode, t12.OCCUPATION_NAME as occupationName, t12.PROVINCE as province, t12.PROVINCE_NAME as provinceName, t12.CITY as city, t12.CITY_NAME as cityName, t12.COUNTY as county, t12.COUNTY_NAME as countyName, t12.TOWN as town, t12.TOWN_NAME as townName, t12.VILLAGE as village, t12.HOUSE_NUM as houseNum, t12.WORKING_ORG as workingOrg, to_char(t12.ADMISSION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as admissionDate, to_char(t12.RECORD_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as serviceTime, t12.CHIEF_COMPLAINT as chiefComplaint, t12.PRESENT_ILLNESS as presentIllness, t12.DISEASES_HISTORY as diseasesHistory, t12.IS_INFECTIOUS as isInfectious, t12.INFECTION_HISTORY as infectionHistory, t12.VACCINATION_HISTORY as vaccinationHistory, t12.SURGERY_HISTORY as surgeryHistory, t12.BT_HISTORY as btHistory, t12.ALLERGY_HISTORY as allergyHistory, t12.PERSONAL_HISTORY as personalHistory, t12.MARITAL_HISTORY as maritalHistory, t12.MENSTRUATION_HISTORY as menstruationHistory, t12.FAMILY_HISTORY as familyHistory, t12.FLAG_FOUR_DIAGNOSIS as flagFourDiagnosis, t12.FOUR_DIAGNOSIS as fourDiagnosis, t12.THERAPEUTIC_TREATMENT as therapeuticTreatment, t12.REPRESENTOR_NAME as representorName, t12.LINKMAN_RELATION_CODE as linkmanRelationCode, t12.LINKMAN_RELATION_NAME as linkmanRelationName, t12.IS_RELIABLE as isReliable, t12.RECEPTION_DOCTOR_CODE as receptionDoctorCode, t12.RECEPTION_DOCTOR_NAME as receptionDoctorName, t12.ADMISSION_DOCTOR_CODE as admissionDoctorCode, t12.ADMISSION_DOCTOR_NAME as admissionDoctorName, t12.ATTENDING_DOCTOR_CODE as attendingDoctorCode, t12.ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME as doctorName, t12.CHIEF_DOCTOR_CODE as chiefDoctorCode, t12.CHIEF_DOCTOR_NAME as chiefDoctorName, t12.AUDTOR_NAME as audtorName, t12.INPATIENT_TIMES as inpatientTimes, t12.ADMISSION_TYPE_CODE as admissionTypeCode, t12.ADMISSION_TYPE_NAME as admissionTypeName, t12.OUT_ORDERS_DOCTOR_NAME as outOrdersDoctorName, t12.THERE_DIAGNOSIS_DATAIL as thereDiagnosisDatail, t12.TEMPERATURE as temperature, t12.PULSE_RATE as pulseRate, t12.BREATHING_RATE as breathingRate, t12.PRESSURE_H as pressureH, t12.PRESSURE_L as pressureL, t12.HEIGHT as height, t12.WEIGHT as weight, t12.GENERAL_EXAM_RESULT as generalExamResult, t12.SKIN_EXAM_RESULT as skinExamResult, t12.LYMPH_EXAM_RESULT as lymphExamResult, t12.HEAD_EXAM_RESULT as headExamResult, t12.NECK_EXAM_RESULT as neckExamResult, t12.CHEST_EXAM_RESULT as chestExamResult, t12.BELLY_EXAM_RESULT as bellyExamResult, t12.ANUS_EXAM_RESULT as anusExamResult, t12.GENITALS_EXAM_RESULT as genitalsExamResult, t12.SPINE_EXAM_RESULT as spineExamResult, t12.ARMS_LEGS_EXAM_RESULT as armsLegsExamResult, t12.EERVOUS_SYS_EXAM_RESULT as eervousSysExamResult, t12.SPECIAL_EXAM_RESULT as specialExamResult, t12.GENERAL_HEALTH as generalHealth, t12.org_code AS "orgCodeTemp", t12.inpatient_num AS "zyIdTemp", ${param}, t13.ID$ as idw, t13.ORG_CODE as orgCodew, t13.ORG_NAME as orgNamew, to_char(t13.CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as updateTimew, t13.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumw, t13.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIdw, t13.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE_CODE as diagnosisTypeCodew, t13.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE_NAME as diagnosisTypeNamew, t13.DISEASE_CODE as diseaseCodew, t13.DISEASE as diseasew, t13.CH_DISEASE_NAME as chDiseaseNamew, t13.CH_DISEASE_CODE as chDiseaseCodew, t13.CH_DISEASE_NAME1 as chDiseaseName1w, t13.CH_DISEASE_CODE1 as chDiseaseCode1w, to_char(t13.DIAGNOSIS_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as diagnosisDatew, t13.PRIMARY_DIAGNOSIS_MARK as primaryDiagnosisMarkw, t13.DISEASE_NUM as diseaseNumw, t14.ID$ as ide, t14.ORG_CODE as orgCodee, t14.ORG_NAME as orgNamee, to_char(t14.CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as updateTimee, t14.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNume, t14.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryIde, t14.EXAM_ITEM as examIteme, t14.EXAM_RESULT as examResulte, to_char(t14.EXAM_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as examTimee, t14.EXAM_TYPE as examTypee FROM PT_EMRI_ADM_REC t12 left join PT_EMRI_ADM_REC_DIAG t13 on t13.INPATIENT_NUM = t12.INPATIENT_NUM and t13.ORG_CODE = t12.ORG_CODE and t13.CASE_HISTORY_ID = t12.CASE_HISTORY_ID left join PT_EMRI_ADM_EXAM t14 on t14.INPATIENT_NUM = t12.INPATIENT_NUM and t14.ORG_CODE = t12.ORG_CODE and t14.CASE_HISTORY_ID = t12.CASE_HISTORY_ID
where
( t12.INPATIENT_NUM=#{item.zyId} and t12.ORG_CODE=#{item.orgCode} )

SELECT rp.ID$ as idq, '出院小结' as name, rp.ORG_CODE as orgCode, rp.ORG_NAME as orgName, rp.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNum, rp.ATTENDING_DOCTOR_CODE as serviceDoctorCode, to_char(rp.CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createdAt, rp.CASE_HISTORY_ID as caseHistoryId, rp.HEALTH_CARD_NUM as healthCardNum, rp.DEP_CODE as deptCode, rp.DEP_NAME as deptName, rp.AREA_NAME as areaName, rp.WARD_NUM as wardNum, rp.SICKBED_NUM as sickbedNum, rp.IDCARD_NUM as idcardNum, rp.IDCARD_TYPE as idcardType, rp.OTHER_ID_NUM as otherIdNum, rp.PNAME as pname, rp.SEX_CODE as sexCode, rp.AGE_YEARS as ageYears, rp.AGE_MONTHS as ageMonths, rp.AGE_DAYS as ageDays, rp.AGE_HOURS as ageHours, rp.MARITAL_STATUS_CODE as maritalStatusCode, rp.MARITAL_STATUS_NAME as maritalStatusName, rp.OCCUPATION_CODE as occupationCode, rp.OCCUPATION_NAME as occupationName, rp.TEL as tel, rp.ADDRESS_TYPE_CODE as addressTypeCode, rp.PROVINCE as province, rp.CITY as city, rp.COUNTY as county, rp.TOWN as town, rp.VILLAGE as village, rp.HOUSE_NUM as houseNum, rp.POSTAL_CODE as postalCode, rp.LINKMAN_NAME as linkmanName, rp.LINKMAN_TEL as linkmanTel, to_char(rp.ADMISSION_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as admissionDate, to_char(rp.DISCHARGE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as dischargeDate, rp.INPATIENT_DAY as inpatientDay, rp.RESIDENT_DOCTOR_CODE as residentDoctorCode, rp.RESIDENT_DOCTOR_NAME as residentDoctorName, rp.ATTENDING_DOCTOR_CODE as attendingDoctorCode, rp.ATTENDING_DOCTOR_NAME as doctorName, rp.SUPERIOR_DOCTOR_NAME as superiorDoctorName, to_char(rp.SIGNTRUE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as serviceTime, rp.ADMISSION_SITUATION as admissionSituation, rp.TREAT_RESULT_CODE as treatResultCode, rp.TREAT_PROCESS as treatProcess, rp.DISCHARGE_SITUATION as dischargeSituation, rp.DISCHARGE_SIGNS as dischargeSigns, rp.ASSIST_EXAM_RESULT as assistExamResult, rp.IN_DISCHARGE_SIGNS as inDischargeSigns, rp.INSPECT_CONSULTATION as inspectConsultation, rp.SPECIAL_EXAM as specialExam, rp.DISEASE_OUTCOME_CODE as diseaseOutcomeCode, rp.COMPLICATION as complication, rp.DISCHARGE_ORDER as dischargeOrder, rp.FLAG_FOUR_DIAGNOSIS as flagFourDiagnosis, rp.FOUR_DIAGNOSIS as fourDiagnosis, rp.TREATMENT_METHOD as treatmentMethod, rp.TCM_DECOCTION_METHOD as tcmDecoctionMethod, rp.MEDICATION_METHOD as medicationMethod FROM ${tempTableName} rp

select id$ as "id", '住院诊断' as "name", ORG_CODE as "orgCode", ORG_NAME as "orgName", INPATIENT_NUM as "inpatientNum", to_char(CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "createdAt", DIAG_ID as "diagId", PNAME as "pname", IDCARD_NUM as "idcardNum", IDCARD_TYPE as "idcardType", OTHER_ID_NUM as "otherIdNum", DIAGNOSIS_CHIEF_FLAG as "diagnosisChiefFlag", DIAGNOSIS_TYPE as "diagnosisType", HG_IN_OUT_SIGN_CODE as "hgInOutSignCode", TCM_WM_MARK_CODE as "tcmWmMarkCode", DIAGNOSIS_CODE as "diagnosisIllCode", DIAGNOSIS_NAME as "diagnosisIllName", DIAGNOSIS_DOCTOR_NAME as "doctorName", '' as "personIdentityType", '' as "personalIdentificationNumber", '' as "recordState", to_char(CREATED_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as "diagnosisDate", '' as "diagnosticCode", '' as "diagnosticStandardCode", DIAGNOSIS_TYPE as "diagnosticTypeCode", '' as "diseaseDifferentiationCode", '' as "syndromeId", '' as "diagnosisOrder", '' as "diagnosisCode", DIAGNOSIS_NAME as "diagnosisName", '' as "isDiagnose", '' as "dischargeStatusCode", '' as "writeTime", '' as "cancelTime", '' as "editTime", org_code AS "orgCodeTemp", inpatient_num AS "zyIdTemp", ${param} from PT_IP_DIAGNOSE t where
( t.INPATIENT_NUM=#{item.zyId} and t.ORG_CODE=#{item.orgCode} )

select * from ( select o.ID$ as id, '住院医嘱' as name, o.MPIID$ as mpiid, o.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNum, o.INPATIENT_NUM as "zyIdTemp", o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.ORG_CODE as "orgCodeTemp", o.ORG_NAME as orgName, to_char(o.ORDER_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordTime, o.ORDER_ID as OrderId, o.REMARK as remark, o.PNAME as pname, o.VALID_PERIOD as validPeriod, o.SICKBED_NUM as sickbedNum, o.DEPT_CODE as deptCode, o.DEPT_NAME as deptName, o.ORDER_DEPT_CODE as orderDeptCode, o.ORDER_DEPT_NAME as orderDeptName, o.ORDER_DOC_CODE as orderDocCode, o.ORDER_DOC_NAME as doctorName, ${param}, d.id$ as iddo, to_char(d.ORDER_CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderTime, ORDER_ADVICE_NUM as orderAdviceNum, ORDER_ITEM_GROUP as orderItemGroup, to_char(d.ORDER_EXECUTE_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderExeStartTime, to_char(d.ORDER_EXECUTE_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderExeEndTime, ORDER_EXE_DEPT_CODE as orderExeDeptCode, ORDER_EXE_DEPT_NAME as orderExeDeptName, ORDER_AUDITOR_NAME as orderAuditorName, ORDER_EXECUTION_CODE as orderExcutionCode, ORDER_EXECUTION_NAME as orderExcutionName, to_char(d.ORDER_EXE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderStartTime, to_char(d.ORDER_STOP_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderStopTime, to_char(d.CONFIRM_STOP_TAIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as confrirmStopTime, STOP_DOCTOR_CODE as stopDocCode, STOP_DOCTOR_NAME as stopDocName, ORDER_DATAIL_CODE as orderItemCode, ORDER_DATAIL_NAME as orderItemName, ORDER_ITEM_TYPE_CODE as orderItemTypeCode, ORDER_ITEM_TYPE_NAME as orderItemTypeName, ORDER_ADVICE_USEAGE as orderAdviceUsage, ORDER_ADVICE_FREQUENCY as orderAdviceFrequency, to_char(d.EVERY_TIME_DOSE, '9990.99') as everyTimeDose, EACH_DOSAGE_UNITS as eachDosageUnit, to_char(d.NUMBER_EACH_USEAGE) as eachNumber, UNIT_EACH_USEAGE as eachUsageUnit, to_char(d.DISPENSING_QUANTITY) as dispensingNum, DISPENSING_QUANTITY_UNIT as dispensingNumUnit, to_char(d.DRUG_DAYS) as days, ORDER_PROOFREAD_NURSE_NAME as orderProofreadNurseName, STOP_NURSE_NAME as stopNurseName FROM PT_IP_ORDERS o left join PT_IP_ORDER_DRUGS d on o.ORG_CODE=d.ORG_CODE and o.INPATIENT_NUM=d.INPATIENT_NUM and o.ORDER_ID=d.ORDER_ID union select o.ID$ as id, '住院医嘱' as name, o.MPIID$ as mpiid, o.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNum, o.INPATIENT_NUM as "zyIdTemp", o.ORG_CODE as orgCode, o.ORG_CODE as "orgCodeTemp", o.ORG_NAME as orgName, to_char(o.ORDER_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordTime, o.ORDER_ID as OrderId, o.REMARK as remark, o.PNAME as pname, o.VALID_PERIOD as validPeriod, o.SICKBED_NUM as sickbedNum, o.DEPT_CODE as deptCode, o.DEPT_NAME as deptName, o.ORDER_DEPT_CODE as orderDeptCode, o.ORDER_DEPT_NAME as orderDeptName, o.ORDER_DOC_CODE as orderDocCode, o.ORDER_DOC_NAME as doctorName, ${param}, d1.id$ as iddo, to_char(d1.ORDER_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderTime, ORDER_ADVICE_NUM as orderAdviceNum, ORDER_ITEM_GROUP as orderItemGroup, to_char(d1.ORDER_EXE_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderExeStartTime, to_char(d1.ORDER_EXE_END_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderExeEndTime, ORDER_EXE_DEPT_CODE as orderExeDeptCode, ORDER_EXE_DEPT_NAME as orderExeDeptName, '' as orderAuditorName, ORDER_EXECUTION_CODE as orderExcutionCode, ORDER_EXECUTION_NAME as orderExcutionName, to_char(d1.ORDER_START_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderStartTime, to_char(d1.ORDER_STOP_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as orderStopTime, to_char(d1.CONFIRM_STOP_TAIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as confrirmStopTime, STOP_DOCTOR_CODE as stopDocCode, STOP_DOCTOR_NAME as stopDocName, ORDER_ADVICE_DATAIL_CODE as orderItemCode, ORDER_ADVICE_DATAIL_NAME as orderItemName, ORDER_ITEM_TYPE_CODE as orderItemTypeCode, ORDER_ITEM_TYPE_NAME as orderItemTypeName, '' as orderAdviceUsage, EXECUTION_FREQUENCY as orderAdviceFrequency, '' as everyTimeDose, '' as eachDosageUnit, '' as eachNumber, '' as eachUsageUnit, '' as dispensingNum, '' as dispensingNumUnit, '' as days, ORDER_PROOFREAD_NURSE_NAME as orderProofreadNurseName, STOP_NURSE_NAME as stopNurseName FROM PT_IP_ORDERS o, PT_IP_ORDER_OTHERS d1 where o.ORG_CODE=d1.ORG_CODE and o.INPATIENT_NUM=d1.INPATIENT_NUM and o.ORDER_ID=d1.ORDER_ID ) ord where
( ord.inpatientNum=#{item.zyId} and ord.orgCode=#{item.orgCode} )
order by inpatientNum,orderAdviceNum,recordTime

select d12.ID$ as idq, '住院费用' as name, d12.MPIID$ as mpiidq, d12.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumq, d12.ORG_CODE as orgCodeq, to_char(d12.SETTLEMENT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as serviceTimeq, d12.ORG_NAME as orgNameq, d12.SETTLEMENT_ID as settlementIdq, d12.CHARGE_STATUS as chargeStatusq, d12.INVOICE_NUM as invoiceNumq, d12.CHARGE_SCENE_CODE as chargeSceneCodeq, d12.CHARGE_SCENE_NAME as chargeSceneNameq, d12.PATIENT_SOURCE as patientSourceq, d12.CHARGE_MODE_CODE as chargeModeCodeq, d12.CHARGE_MODE_NAME as chargeModeNameq, d12.SETTLEMENT_AMOUNT as settlementAmountq, d12.SELF_AMOUNT as selfAmountq, d12.SETTLEMENT_PERSON_CODE as settlementPersonCodeq, d12.SETTLEMENT_PERSON_NAME as settlementPersonNameq, d12.org_code AS "orgCodeTemp", d12.inpatient_num AS "zyIdTemp", ${param}, d13.ID$ as idw, d13.ORG_CODE as orgCodew, d13.INPATIENT_NUM as inpatientNumw, d13.ORG_NAME as orgNamew, d13.CHARGE_ID as chargeIdw, d13.ORDER_ID as orderIdw, d13.SETTLEMENT_ID as settlementIdw, d13.DEP_CODE as depCodew, d13.DEP_NAME as depNamew, d13.PRESCRIBER_CODE as prescriberCodew, d13.PRESCRIBER_NAME as prescriberNamew, d13.PERFORMER_CODE as performerCodew, d13.PERFORMER_NAME as performerNamew, d13.CHARGE_CLASSIFIED_CODE as chargeClassifiedCodew, d13.CHARGE_CLASSIFIED_NAME as chargeClassifiedNamew, to_char(d13.CHARGE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as chargeTimew, d13.ITEM_CODE as itemCodew, d13.ITEM_NAME as itemNamew, d13.ITEM_UNI as itemUnitw, d13.ITEM_PRICE as itemPricew, d13.TITEM_TYPE_CODE as itemTypeCodew, d13.ITEM_TYPE_NAME as itemTypeNamew, d13.ITEM_COUNT as itemCountw, d13.ITEM_RECEIVABLE_AMOUNT as itemReceivableAmountw, d13.ITEM_PAID_CMOUNT as itemPaidCmountw FROM PT_IP_CHARGE d12 left join pt_ip_charge_detail d13 on d13.inpatient_num = d12.INPATIENT_NUM AND d13.org_code = d12.ORG_CODE AND d13.settlement_id = d12.SETTLEMENT_ID where
( d12.INPATIENT_NUM=#{item.zyId} and d12.ORG_CODE=#{item.orgCode} )
